full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 95 of 236 999 LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross 1 Q. A mandate from Mr. Epstein? 2 A. Absolutely. 3 Q. And a secret between you and Mr. Epstein about the other women coming; correct? 4 5 A. A secret from me and Mr. Epstein? He have no secrets with me, sir. He never share anything of his personal life with me. 6 7 Q. It was a secret between you and Mr. Epstein that was kept from Ms. Maxwell; correct? 8 9 A. Sir, he never told me, this is a secret, don't tell Ghislaine about this. He never suggest it, imply, or told me about that. 10 11 12 Q. Why did you think you were taking her pictures down, Mr. Alessi? 13 14 A. I have no idea, sir. 15 Q. Towards the end of your stay with Mr. Epstein, working for 16 Mr. Epstein, that was about the same time that you met Virginia 17 Roberts; correct? 18 A. I'm not clear about these dates. I have difficult to remember exactly what years or what you're talking about, what years or what timeframe. I left at the end of the year at 19 20 21 2002, sir. 22 Q. And that's the same time that you -- around the same time that you recall meeting Ms. Roberts; is that right? 23 24 A. Probably was 2002, probably was 2001. I'm not sure. 25 Q. Okay. And that's around the same time that there were more SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012609
